title: Creepy: The Full Collection of 38 True Ghost Stories and Short Fiction with a Supernatural Twist (Creepy Series Bundle)
features: 38 TRUE GHOST STORIES & SUPERNATURAL SHORT FICTION
Damn! That was fascinating, Jeff. An interesting story, well told. Thanks for sharing."
Very interesting story, Jeff! I don't think I would've gotten much sleep either.
CREEPY: The FULL Collection (Book 1, Book 2, Book 3):

The Creepy Collection is a series of 3 one-of-a-kind paranormal books mixed with a variety of supernatural fiction and true ghost stories. Creepy: The Full Collection, contains 38 stories in all. Best of all, it includes three of the author's real life paranormal experiences... absolutely true ghost stories.
With the author using horror as a psychological special effect, Murdoch's Eyes packs a fearsome punch. A killer of a short story thriller!
" - Michele Tater, The Couch Tater Review"
Murdoch's Eyes is a wicked, twisted little tale. A thrilling paranormal both well written and with some truly freaky characters. I don't think I'll ever look at anyone with green eyes the same again.
" - Jen Wylie, Author of Sweet Light
description: I was around ten years old when I had my first supernatural experience. I've seen full-bodied apparitions, felt a dark presence practically breathing down my neck, and experienced a ghost (or something) that seemed more curious than anything.Â As a horror/supernatural/mystery/thriller writer, I just had to put together a collection like this. Do I believe in ghosts? Read this 3-book collection and find out for yourself! ~ Jeff Bennington
